sentence.Network_en: Splashdown is expected 300 kilometres west of Valparai so.
sentence.Network_cn: 溅落位置预定在瓦尔帕来索以西300公里.

sentence.Network_en: Recovery ships and helicopters are headed for the splashdown area.
sentence.Network_cn: 载回船只和直升飞机正向溅落区进发.

sentence.Network_en: The recovery crew is awaiting the splashdown of the space shuttle.
sentence.Network_cn: 回收队正在等待太空船(海上)溅落.

entry.def: A splashdown is the landing of a spacecraft in the sea after a flight.

means.word_mean: 1. a landing of a spacecraft in the sea at the end of a space flight
